tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: When we got to know me and my husband were pregnant we wanted the best doctor to help us throughout because, quite honestly we didnt know anything about anything. We met with Dr. Sriprada and immediately we knew we were in the best hands. The most down to earth, friendliest and coolest doctor you will meet. She is so supportive from the very beginning and will surely eradicate all your fears till the very end. Me and Anurag had the best experience with her as our doc and would highly recommend her to be your doctor too.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
context: Normal Vaginal Delivery (NVD),Genetic Disorders During Pregnancy,Pre and Post Delivery Care,
review: While we learnt that I was pregnant, my husband and I were very keen on having a normal delivery versus C sec. We reached out to Dr Sriprada who I would highly recommend for all OBG related issues. She spoke to us with ease and had this ever smilling face. Through the entire pregnancy she explained us, guided us so we could head towards a smooth delivery process. When in doubt, she always asked me to conduct tests,  such as glucose tolerance/ challenge test, urine culture and routine to rule out and possibly catch any issues early. She suggested me to follow a diet chart early on to avoid gestational diabetes.  when we were heading close to term, she promptly monitored the baby weight so we could have a safe and easy normal delivery. On the day of hospitalization, she took special care to ensure I was comfortable at each juncture, when I thought the entire process was overwhelming, she motivated me, gave me a push, encouraged me that I'll be able to deliver baby smoothly. Also, when the baby was born and the placenta did not come off like it should have, she was quick to act and manually removed the placenta to avoid further complications. Dr Sriprada is highly-qualified and experienced. Due to her immense knowledge, she handles even the complex situations with ease. At 28 weeks, the radiologist confirmed that my baby had a congenital anamoly, Dr Sriprada was very kind to comfort/counsel us when we needed it most. She connected us with the best doctors she knew so our baby could the best care once born. There's never been a day when she's not responded to my innumerable questions on Whatsapp! My husband and I are ever grateful and thankful to her for making this experience so worthwhile.

tags: None
review:
I am not a great writer that i can express my gratitude to Dr.Sripradha

It was 6 years of my marriage and I was not able to conceive. Previous doctors diagnosed PCOS problem and mentioned that it would be difficulty in conceiving. We lost interest and had stopped thinking about having a baby.

	After 2 years, one of my aunt suggested Dr Sripradha in Cloudnine. I took an appointment and met her. She seemed to be down to earth, friendly, understanding and took time to diagnose and come to a conclusion for any medication further. I was diagnosed Chocolate cyst and did a laparoscopy.  

She gave all the positive vibes to us and we as a couple had really found it to be developed hope and were sure this time. I conceived in next 2 months!!!

Dr.Sripradha helped me all 9 months to have a pleased and smooth going pregnancy. She carried her patience all over my pregnancy with all my stupid questions and unnecessary scare of anything unpleasant to happen. 

She was so committed and helpful during all the ups and downs in my pregnancy when I had complications in my 5th month.

On 10th July 2015, I delivered a baby boy – Healthy, Tall and Heavy weighted that really changed my world.

Thanks to Dr.Sripradha for all the joy I am enjoying in my motherhood

I have recomended Dr. Sripradha to most of my friends and relatives who have really been happy and found a positive results.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Dear Dr. Sriprada Vinekar,

Tanya and I had an incredible experience with you during our pregnancy. The normal delivery was a wonderful culmination of your care and support. Your approachability and openness have always been a comfort to us. When we've discussed anything with you, you've explained everything with a warm smile, eliminating our usual fear of doctor visits 😄. Your sharing of personal contact details during our initial visit made us feel supported and cared for throughout. Every consultation left us feeling confident and positive about our journey. Your detailed explanations at every stage of the pregnancy were immensely helpful. Despite your hectic schedule, your lively presence was always reassuring. Thank you for making our pregnancy journey comfortable and creating memories we'll cherish forever.

Tanya and Nithin Poovanna

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,
review: Me and my husband consulted  Dr Sripradha through a friends reference, ever since that visit we wanted her only to be my doctor until I deliver. Her friendly nature, the way she explains every stage of pregnancy, her patience and her smile, just keeps any pregnant women at ease.. she answered to all my queries patiently at every visit. She made my pregnancy journey as smooth as possible.  Even on the day of my delivery, even though it was in the middle of the night she came to the hospital and made sure she was there until the baby was born and it was a normal delivery. Every stage was explained even in the labour room and I don’t think anyone could have made my delivery feel so easy! Thanks to the doctor, she was really like another mother at the labour room. I highly recommend her to all the preggie mommies!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: ** ******** ** ** *** *** **** ****** * **** *** ***** *** *** ***** ** ** ****** ********** The best thing about the doctor is, she always had explained every single piece of information related to my wife's pregnancy with detail. How and when a medicine should be taken and if not taken in the correct way what can be the outcome - she used to explain clearly. In addition to that she always made a point to check with us if we had anything to ask. I would say, the doctor always takes the patient (I won't say a pregnant woman is a patient exactly) and her family into full confidence. Thanks doc for giving us the gift of our life - our beautiful daughter.

tags: None
review: A very pleasent experience throughout pregnancy and even the delivery was a cake walk with Dr Sripada's constant care and help. She knows how to keep the mood light and always gives everyone positive vibes which goes a long way in helping patients. I was lucky to have her conduct my delivery through a normal method which would otherwise have been a c section. Greatfull to her for all her constant support and prompt replies to my mails. Gave me the courage to travel freely and work even when I was carrying. One needs to be lucky to have her as a doctor

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
***** **** *** ** *** **** ** ****** ****** 
I have been consulting her for my pregnancy and she is so nice. She ll explain everything and never in a hurry. 

I have seen her in both Apollo and Cloudnine. 
Cloudnine has a lot of waiting. 
Apollo has better service 

She always will tell you the reason for whatever medication she is putting you on without us asking. 

She hasn’t scared me once during my pregnancy. Dr. is very cool, calm and composed. She always matches our wavelength when she talks to us which makes me more comfortable. 😌

She is so much fun
She is available on WhatsApp for any query she doesn’t ignore if it’s small or big issue. ****** *** **** ******

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I'm visiting my parents and my trip was almost coming to an end when a routine ultrasound scan raised an alarm.  I was able to get an appointment with Dr. Sriprada within a day and discuss my medical situation in detail and what steps I should be taking next.  Dr. Sriprada was welcoming and very approachable, while being to the point and very professional.  The appointment with her helped me make quick informed decisions and I was ready for a laproscopy in the the next few days. She is an mazing doctor with a wonderful team. I was briefed about the procedure and told every thing I needed to know and what to expect. This put me to great ease as I knew I was in experienced hands.. Its been a week since my surgery and I'm feeling wonderful!! A huge shout out to Dr. Sriprada for relentlessly working to heal and alleviate pain in so many people. Thank you for your hardwork and empathy!!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Dr Sriprada is one stop solution for all Gynec related problems..I visited doctor for my pregnancy regular check up and got delivered at Cloudnine Malleshwaram...the entire journey was handled in the most precise way...even before you have a question in your mind Dr explains the do's and don'ts so that you have a clear mind to enjoy the pregnancy period...I would highly recommend to visit her as she is always smiling with positive approach...staff are with great support specially Bharti at Ground floor reception is very approachable for any queries related to pre and post pregnancy concerns as very time you need not have to meet Dr for queries... Bharti quickly understand the patients needs and direct them..I am really thankful to Dr Sriprada and have always a feel a salute in my heart for her knowledge in the field of medical science.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Visited for first pregnancy, it was breeze to be under her guidance. At every visit she cleared all  doubts, guided on diet, exercise, do's n don't. Always available to clear any sort of doubts. Even during delivery she guided to concentrate on push rather than on pain because of which could delivery normally. Even after the delivery and episiotomy  was done she made sure there was no sort of bleeding / any tear left and made sure that I recovered well after delivery. Such a bliss to get such doctors.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
We are visiting doc from 2nd month of pregnency till 6th at present.It has always bn a smiling n satisfied face with grt sigh of relief which we carry,on,  whenever we come out of doc's cabin, though whatever level of adversity we had before seeing her.


It's nt only always a pleasure seeing our doc because she is so calm n reachable, but what really satisfies is her level of depth in her field.

She just has a glance at ur file n medical reports ...N ther she is ...always thorough with her concepts n advices.

Whatever doubts a pregnant lady have in her mind till then (n they do hav a lot every time !!!). It's always very easy to put up in front of doc as she listens to those with grt patience n then clears those just perfectly..

Her credentials (if u haven't gone through, just check, what an achiever) are easily evident during every meet with  her quite convincing  advices n also with her v easy going nature to make u relaxed !!

A rare combination as an medico !!!!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
context: Pregnancy Check Up,Pre and Post Delivery Care,
review: I wanted a good gynecologist for my pregnant wife, who can be with us in most important journey of our life. I surfer the web for a day or two and based on reviews decided to go to Dr. Sriprada. In first meeting with Dr Sriprada we understood that she is the one we was looking for. She is so friendly with her patients that most of the time patients will not feel that they are sitting with their Doctor. She answer all your queries and does not give any false hopes and does not prescribe any unwanted medicines as well. With her support my wife delivered a healthy baby boy on 14th Feb and it was normal deliver. We are very thankful to Dr. Sriprada for all her support and we wish her best of luck in her life.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I’m really very happy with the doctor service and actually I was not knowing the problem for me but when I consult the Sriprada mam  then I got to know the actually solution for my problem now I’m very happy with sriprada mam friendliness and concern about the patient

review: Utter mismanagement by the hospital.,  I didnt even meet the doctor despite having taking one week prior appointment. I paid the whole fees for consultation.They made me wait for 2 whole hours. Highly disappointed. I kept telling I am a doctor and i have my own patient appointments, despite that,they made me wait and also sent other pregnant ladies before me even though I came prior to them.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Dr Sriprada has been extremely good in terms of explaining things, is very patient while responding to queries and most importantly is very friendly with the patient which gives the patient a lot of comfort. Me and my wife would strongly recommend Dr Sriprada to expecting monthers.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,Value for money,
review: One's first visit to Dr. Sriprada feels like the Nth visit - she is so friendly and puts one at ease.  I felt very comfortable with her and confident about myself.  No doubt this was my first visit - but I intend every future visit I might need to be only to her.  Thank you, Dr. Sriprada!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Sriprada Ma'am is very friendly in listening to the problem. I got really impressed when my mother got a solution to her problem. She had fibroids as big as a 10cm (increasing from last 10 years) along with hernia(for the third time).  Mom lost her hope. This is when we consulted Sriprada ma'am and she explained us the problem and the solution very clearly. My mother was approaching her menopause stage however she was bledding badly and complained severe pain . Ma'am guided all of us and helped my mother in getting her  Hysterectomy done. Mom is very happy after her surgery.
Now me and my husband are planning to have our second baby.I did not conceive yet. Consulted ma'am for the problem. She patiently diagnosed the problem and suggested us a treatment.
I recommend Sriprada ma'am to everyone.
Thanks.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,
review: I consulted with Dr. Sriprada during my pregnancy. The thing I liked the most about her was that she always clearly explained my health reports, the numbers etc to me so that I could very well understand the need for any medication or procedure. This also helped me make a quick decision when required. And also she was available by mail and phone number for simple questions which was very convenient.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: ****** ******** ** *** ** *** **** ****** *** *** ***** I first went to her for a second opinion when other doctors had recommended laparoscopic surgery for my cyst(the second time) but being a surgeon, she advised me against it as it would effect my fertility adversely . Sure enough I conceived soon after with her treatment. 5 years hence, I still go to her and send all my relatives and friends to her. She's down to earth,dynamic,friendly and an undisputed expert in her field.
